body:
Comment 17: 
gofmt does what you asked for.

"gofmt ." will format all packages under the current directory, including directories
starting
with ".", because it is perfectly legal to save a package in a directory named ".hidden".

it does know about hidden directories, nor should it.
for example, what if you run gofmt on a windows machine, where dot prefixed directories
are not treated as hidden, with a samba mount from linux?
